title: morning walk trip
review: I went to this temple with my yoga group and it was a nice trip. quiet and peaceful surrounding, great views from the top floor.

title: Great Temple
review: Bhootnath Temple is also one of the great temple in Rishikesh.  This temple is beautiful.  We enjoyed here alot.

title: great experience
review: it is very peaceful place. visit early morning if you want to see beauty with nature. click some photos and walk with views. great

title: No Ghost here
review: An excellent place to pass your time when one is around Ram jhulla area, a walk to the place will not give you any shiver though as the name suggests

title: Must visit
review: Just climb on top of this temple and see the mesmerizing views of river Ganges and Rishikesh city. This place will help you to find your inner peace. Bit lonely though.

title: lovely views
review: you get a lovely view of the garhwal region sitting atop  this temple and it is very peaceful because not too many tourists visit this place.

title: Special place with the view of whole city
review: This is really a special place. It is not in the midst of the crowd. I had to walk around to reach this temple. The temple is very peaceful. Nestled in the lower slope of a mountain. If you go all the way up to the top, you can sit and relax for a while and enjoy the cool breeze. At night it is uniquely lit with red bulbs.

title: Awesome
review: We can climb on the top and enjoy beautiful view of Rishikesh.  The place is peaceful and awesome.  We normally visit and spend few hours here.
